That high‐probability, rapid payback secures next year’s budget targets, whereas any meaningful margin restoration in Consumer would likely stretch beyond the cycle and carry significantly greater execution uncertainty.
second_reasoning: We’re putting $15 million into Consumer R&D to pursue a high‐upside product breakthrough—structured with clear three‐ and six‐month gates to manage execution risk—and $5 million into Industrial R&D to capture a reliable two-point cost reduction within 12 months.
